content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah Rahman, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I am looking for the highest possible rental price to maximize my gains. May I ask what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 400 Euros per month. Is that too high or too low?

TERMINATE
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I believe that 400 Euros per month is a fair rental price for a 25 square meter apartment. However, I would like to clarify that this is my final offer and I am not willing to negotiate any further. Thank you for considering my apartment, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. Thank you for your time, and I appreciate your willingness to meet with me. I will think about it and get back to you soon.

TERMINATE
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your understanding, Ryanah. I appreciate your interest in my apartment and I look forward to hearing from you soon. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out.
name: Heinrich Heine
